abstract: J. Michael Evans, once seen as a potential candidate to be Goldman’s chief executive, will help the Chinese e-commerce giant expand abroad.
snippet: J. Michael Evans, once seen as a potential candidate to be Goldman’s chief executive, will help the Chinese e-commerce giant expand abroad.
lead_paragraph: To oversee international expansion, the Alibaba Group is turning to a former Goldman Sachs executive who has long worked with the Chinese Internet giant.

headline.main: Alibaba Names Former Goldman Sachs Executive as President

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
